tool_description: Search for movies via advanced queries like genre, name, etc. And get all their details
name: Advanced Movie Search
title: Advanced Movie Search

api_list.name: Genre List
api_list.description: Get list of all available genres
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://advanced-movie-search.p.rapidapi.com/genre/movie/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "advanced-movie-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://advanced-movie-search.p.rapidapi.com/genre/movie/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "advanced-movie-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
